title: Ticket #3546: Advertise CPU flags.
description:
In light of LIGO's recent standard universe troubles with the AVX instruction-set extensions, it has been suggested that it would be worthwhile for HTCondor to advertise the CPU flags (or equivalent). While this could be accomplished with a startd cron job, having an official HTCondor standard would improve pool interoperability, and it's arguably HTCondor's responsibility anyway.

One suggestion was to extend/improve the Arch attribute much in the same spirit as OpSys. Another obvious option is just to advertise the CPU flags directly (e.g., cpu_has_avx = true); it probably depends on how to make writing requirements expressions the simplest.
remarks: Implemented as part of #3544.
